Dec 17 (Reuters) - :
*INDIA'S FUTURE GROUP IS UNLIKELY TO COOPERATE WITH AMAZON IF IT TRIES TO REAPPLY FOR ANTITRUST CLEARANCE AFTER 2019 DEAL SUSPENDED-SOURCE *FUTURE GROUP WILL LIKELY TAKE ANTITRUST SUSPENSION OF 2019 AMAZON DEAL TO LEGAL FORUMS, SAY AMAZON HAS NO LEGAL BASIS TO CHALLENGE ASSETS SALE-SOURCE *Further company coverage: AMZN.O

  • ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;))

((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 17-DEC-202113:15:00.07 GMT
